data.title: Why do some people hate fantasy?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 30): Most people who don’t read fantasy don’t hate it. Often, it’s just not their cup of tea, or they have never really had much to do with it.

Some people are put off from fantasy because they have a certain image of it as a slew of clichés about a farmboy who becomes “the Chosen O...
